localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Deutsche Bank will no longer do business with Trump or any of his companies. Trump reportedly owes the bank over $300 million.

Meanwhile, Signature Bank called for Trump to step down. https://t.co/4SzdAxI9vl
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text:
德意志银行将不再与特朗普或他的任何公司开展业务。据报道，特朗普欠该银行3亿多美元。

与此同时，签名银行呼吁特朗普下台。https://t.co/4SzdAxI9vl。

德意志銀行將不再與特朗普或他的任何公司開展業務。據報道，特朗普欠該銀行3億多美元。

與此同時，簽名銀行呼籲特朗普下臺。https://t.co/4SzdAxI9vl。

previous.excerpt:
CD Projekt Red (OTGLF) stock is underrated.

Despite the negative press, Cyberpunk 2077 sold over 10.2 million digital
copies, with PC accounting for around 80% of those sales. This despite Sony
removing Cyberpunk 2077 from the PlayStation Store in the middle of December
2020 following the…

localize.title: CD Projekt Red (OTGLF)股价自12月发布以来下跌+40%，然而据报道，《赛博朋克2077》却迎来了史上最大的数字游戏发布会。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
CD Projekt Red(OTGLF)的股票被低估了。

份，其中PC的销量占到了80%左右。尽管索尼
12月中旬从PlayStation商店中移除《赛博朋克2077》。
